#summary What you need to use GMFTools.

= Prerequistes =

The GMFTools are based on the following frameworks

 * Eclipse Ganymede 3.4 http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/
 * GMF 2.1.0 http://www.eclipse.org/modeling/gmf/
 * openArchitectureWare 4.3 http://wiki.eclipse.org/OAW

You can download a large bundle containing all of these in the download section of
http://oaw.itemis.de/

Furthermore, if you plan to use shared editing domains, we recommend to install the GMF Bridge Trace Plugin to persist the {{{visualIDs}}} of element types between generator runs.

= Setup = 

 * Download the sources. This can also be done form within Eclipse using an appropriate SVN plugin.
 * Start eclipse and import the plugin sources
 * Export {{{de.itemis.gmf.tools}}} into as a deployable plug-in into your Eclipse installation.
 * Restart Eclipse
